text: Hi there - I’m looking to replace the jpg here, but I cannot find it in HubSpot. I checked Files and Templates under Marketing.
I’m not sure if Default content for modules/templates appears in the File Manager (might be wrong!) - Have you tried checking the template in Design Manager?

It’s not the default content. I’m a designer stepping in here to change out the header images on our website. I searched the assets in the Design Manager with the file name and nothing came up. I’m not finding where the images are being pulled from.
Do you know what template it is in the design manager?
